channel.title: Hearts of Wulin: Vengeance of the Shark Finger Princess Stream
channel.description:
This weekend @edige23 will be be doing a Hearts of Wulin Let's Play stream with +1 EXP (@plusoneexp.on Twitter). Players are Tony Vasinda, @swordqueen and @Auzumel_S . Check out the two-part "Vengeance of the Shark Finger Princess," a tale of weddings and supernatural revenge, this Friday & Saturday at 2000 US Eastern.
Check that out at https://ttrpg.link/HoW

item.title: Hearts of Wulin: Vengeance of the Shark Finger Princess Stream
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

Unfortunately due to a family hospitalization, we’re going to have to reschedule.

Read full topic
